stillFetching.title: We are still fetching some project information. Please come back in approx. 5-10 min.

apply.title: Looking for contributors
apply.confirmationToaster: Thank you! If we need a profile like yours, you'll be contacted shortly
apply.contactNeeded: Please share your telegram handle first so we can reach out to you.

informations.notYetApply: Should your profile align with the requirements of the project, we will reach out to you using one of your provided contact details.

tooltip.notYetApplied: Increase your chance of being contacted by filling out your Telegram on your profile

projectDetails.title: Project details
projectDetails.empty: This project has no additional information to showcase for now.

links.preventAnonymous: Connect to OnlyDust to access more info links

goodFirstIssues.title: Good first issues
goodFirstIssues.description: Apply to a list of curated issues well suited for those new to the project to kickstart your journey.

description.lead: Start taging issues with “good first issue” on GitHub to add them on this section.
description.contributor: This project might have other open issues on its Github page.
